Predictions of total carbon stocks and where mature forest/gaps exist across Terra Nova and Gros Morne National Parks on the island of Newfoundland, Canada. Also includes error estimates.

Use the top navigation bar to explore the output for Terra Nova and Gros Morne National Parks.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Affiliated manuscript**: Predicting carbon storage across maritime boreal forests under combined disturbances. In revision.

**Authors**: Emmerson Wilson, Rachael Moran, Shawn Leroux, Darroch Whitaker, Yolanda Wiersma

**Affiliations**: Memorial University of Newfoundland, Parks Canada

**Funding**: This research was funded by Terra Nova National Park, Gros Morne National Park, and the Natural Sciences and Engineering Research Council of Canada (Canada Graduate Scholarship to ERW and Alliance grant to SJL & YW).
